name: Organic Tomatoes
description: Fresh local organic tomatoes. Perfect for salads, cooking, and sauces. Grown without pesticides.

name: Fresh Spinach
description: Fresh organic spinach bundles. Rich in iron and vitamins. Perfect for cooking or salads.

name: Organic Carrots
description: Fresh organic carrots. Sweet and crunchy. Perfect for snacking, salads, and cooking.

name: Red Apples
description: Fresh crisp red apples. Sweet and juicy. Perfect for snacking and desserts.

description: Fresh green bell peppers. Great for stir-fries, salads, and grilling.

name: Bananas
description: Fresh ripe bananas. Perfect for smoothies, breakfast, and snacking.

name: Potatoes
description: Fresh organic potatoes. Perfect for cooking, baking, and frying.

name: Onions
description: Fresh red onions. Essential ingredient for most Indian dishes.
